    ALWAYS READ THIS NFO PROPERLY
    
                         ** Release Information ** 
  
    Game Notes:
    ~~~~~~~~~~~
    The settler world receives new generation. A new people lines up
    itself in the settler-Microcosms on and will persistently change the
    driving of the Blue-byte-heroes. Morbus - the leader of the dark
    people - does not abandon and learned out of its past contacts with
    the peoples of the settler-universe. Of that technically verse type
    Trojans it attained the knowledge of flight devices to fight. Moreover
    it is would become in search of a remedy for its &quot;green allergy&quot; -
    hereby it invincible! Yet also the Trojans have the renewed attack of
    the dark people toward a few things to set. A new unit - the
    &quot;Rucksackcatapulter&quot; - helps them in the battle against the dark
    Tribe. Many new magic sayings, that are available only the Trojans,
    are a real challenge for each fan of the settler-ranks!&quot;

    
    Game Features:
    ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
    - Experience the main campaign with the Trojans. First you are on the
      escape, you must new find friends and prepare for the fight against
      the dark people.
    - Additional Mayans, Roman and Viking Campaigns.
    - New single and multi-player maps. Each of the maps shifts the player
      into its own small history.
    - Play with your friends against the computer and experience
      cooperation mode.
    - Conflict mode - play against other players in the most diverse
      teams.
    - Restricted Economics - play against the clock to produce 7 of each
      of the goods.
    - New Spells for all 4 Tribes.
    - New map editor - create Trojan missions.
    - Improved AI - the AI uses the resources on the map better.
    - New Trojan Music and Video sepuences.


    Install Notes:
    ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
    1) Make sure you have the main game: The Settlers 4, installed.
    2) Unrar.
    3) Burn the .cue and .bin with CDRWin or Fireburner.
    4) Install the game.
    5) Copy over the cracked S4_Main.exe file from the Crack- dir on cd
       into your Exe-dir in the installdir.
    6) And then play :)
    
    Also check out the intro we included inside the Crack-dir on cd.
